author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-40 Refactored the whole FISE component from "eu.iksproject.fise" -> "org.apache.stanbol.enhancer"
This includes:
- renaming all namespaces that start with "eu.iksproject.fise" to "org.apache.stanbol.enhancer"
- iks-autotagger was reneamed to autotagger
- the clerezza standalone bundle was renamed from "eu.iksproject.fise.clerezza" to "org.apache.stanbol.enhancer.clerezza"
- All Referenced to "fise" in class and method names where changed to Enhancer or removed altogether
- Replaced FISE with Stanbol Enhancer for Documentation and Web UI
- changed all constans that used "eu.iksproject.fise.**" to "org.apache.stanbol.enhancer" (mainly keys used for the configuration)
- changed URIs used in unit tests that mentioned eu.iksproject or fise
- changed the groupId from "eu.iksprojet" to "org.apache.stanbol" for all bundles

- changed the artefactId from "eu.iksproject.fise.**" to "org.apache.stanbol.enhancer.**" for all bundles except JsonLD that uses "org.apache.stanbol.jsonld" (because this will be moved to stanbol-commons in the very near future and than one needs not to change the artefactId twice
- adapted the lite and the full launcher to use the changed bundle names
This excludes:
- any kind of refactoring (e.g. the stanbol.web or the stanbol.common)
- any change related to the URIs of the enhancement structure (this will be done within STANBOL-3)
Open Issues
- the iks-autotagging-data bundle was not changed, because it is still hosted by the NUXEO Vendor Release Repository.
